abstract: Hartmarx, a men’s clothier in bankruptcy protection, faces a surprise obstacle to its plan to designate a London-based investment firm as its preferred buyer.
snippet: Hartmarx, a men’s clothier in bankruptcy protection, faces a surprise obstacle to its plan to designate a London-based investment firm as its preferred buyer.
lead_paragraph: The board of Hartmarx, the Illinois-based men’s clothier that is in bankruptcy protection, faced a surprise obstacle to its plan to designate a London-based investment firm as its preferred buyer, The New York Times’s Steven Greenhouse reported.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Said to Be Squeezing Clothier Hartmarx
